title: Quick Take: Kasich Out, Trump Apparent Nominee
description: Donald Trump's grip on the nomination gets tighter as Ohio Governor John Kasich also suspends his campaign following a loss in the Indiana primary. Campaign reporter Scott Detrow, political editor Domenico Montanaro, and national political correspondent Mara Liasson talk it out. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
